name: Pixel Soldier (original jam version)
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the original #GBJAM5 submission, for the commercial sequel see Roto Force.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

(Web version will perform best using Chrome)

Fight frantic bosses and quickly dash across the stage to avoid enemy attacks.

Color Palette: #220403, #1f5d66, #b6b86f, #dbd7f1 (via http://www.pixelfor.me/crc/) Special thanks to Vlambeer's talk "The Art of Screenshake" for teaching me how to create games that feel right.
